A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is a paradox. It is not a 'meh' movie because there is 'good' in it however it is not a good movie because there is a lot of bad in here. Rey is a Mary Sue\, Luke's character gets assassinated\, Admiral Holdo and Rose are terrible additions to the Star Wars franchise\, the only good characters in this movie are Leia (R.I.P Carrie Fisher) and Kylo Ren. This single-handedly broke Star Wars.
